name: places/ChIJZRpU5yNZwokRcaH1IrTxa8E
formattedAddress: 450 W 31st St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 450 W 31st St, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: Do NOT go here! I attended my mother's pre surgical appointment where we had discussed how despite having cataracts on both eyes we were going to do the left eye first because of the scar tissue that was found posteriorly. The specialist wanted it this way, that way she could get the second surgery ( if needed) sooner rather than later. My mother had waited a year to do this surgery because of family circumstances and when she finally did the did, the RIGHT eye was done instead of the LEFT. The day before my mother expressed concern for the right eye being done vs. left eye but was dismissed. She wanted laser and it was NOT performed. English is her second language which is why I accompany her to all appointments yet still so many mistakes were made. I brought this up in her follow up appointment and was told I would be reached out to. It has been a week and nothing, their primary concern is to have your pre surgical testing clearance from your primary, and once they have that from you they don't care about anything else but your insurance money. As someone who works in healthcare, I am ashamed of this place.

text.text: Do NOT go here! I attended my mother's pre surgical appointment where we had discussed how despite having cataracts on both eyes we were going to do the left eye first because of the scar tissue that was found posteriorly. The specialist wanted it this way, that way she could get the second surgery ( if needed) sooner rather than later. My mother had waited a year to do this surgery because of family circumstances and when she finally did the did, the RIGHT eye was done instead of the LEFT. The day before my mother expressed concern for the right eye being done vs. left eye but was dismissed. She wanted laser and it was NOT performed. English is her second language which is why I accompany her to all appointments yet still so many mistakes were made. I brought this up in her follow up appointment and was told I would be reached out to. It has been a week and nothing, their primary concern is to have your pre surgical testing clearance from your primary, and once they have that from you they don't care about anything else but your insurance money. As someone who works in healthcare, I am ashamed of this place.

originalText.text: The staff members at the surgery center were professional, calm and caring during a serious emergency for my husband. The staff acknowledged our presence immediately and they were prepared to answer questions and provide information that we would need to get through the procedure and beyond.  Having been treated for different medical events in our life, this staff is by far the best I have ever encountered.  Thank you.

originalText.text: Dr. John Khadem operated on my eye in May 2022.  The facility is welcoming!  All doctors and nurses were there for me! I was reassured of the outcome!  I will be forever grateful!
